mapper.select: select uorder.oNumber,user.uname,doctor.name,uorder.price ,uorder.oTime,uorder.status from uorder,sche,user,doctor where uorder.id=user.id and uorder.sNumber=sche.sNumber and sche.dNumber=doctor.dNumber order by uorder.oTime desc

select doctor.dNumber, doctor.name,SUM(uorder.price),COUNT(user.id) from uorder,sche,user,doctor where uorder.id=user.id and uorder.sNumber=sche.sNumber and sche.dNumber=doctor.dNumber GROUP BY doctor.dNumber
